languages.text: "Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"

traits.locale_text: "Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"
"Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"
"Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"
"Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"

languages.text: “真的吗？一切真的要变得越来越好了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"

traits.locale_text: “真的吗？一切真的要变得越来越好了吗？”

languages.text: «¿De verdad? ¿De verdad que van a mejorar las cosas desde ahora?».
languages.original_text: "Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad? ¿De verdad que van a mejorar las cosas desde ahora?».

languages.text: 「本当にそうだろうか？物事は本当に良い方向に変わるのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"

traits.locale_text: 「本当にそうだろうか？物事は本当に良い方向に変わるのだろうか？」

languages.text: "Kann das sein? Bessern sich die Dinge jetzt wirklich?"
languages.original_text: "Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"

traits.locale_text: "Kann das sein? Bessern sich die Dinge jetzt wirklich?"

languages.text: « C'est bien vrai ? Les choses vont enfin s'améliorer ? »
languages.original_text: "Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est bien vrai ? Les choses vont enfin s'améliorer ? »

languages.text: "Sahi mi? İşler iyiye gidecek mi gerçekten?"
languages.original_text: "Can it be? Things are really going to change for the better?"

traits.locale_text: "Sahi mi? İşler iyiye gidecek mi gerçekten?"
